long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you delete (move to trash) you old emails (email received before designated date).

帮助 Gmail 用户 （包括企业用户）删除指定日期之前的邮件会话。释放 Google Account 存储空间。
